name: selfh-st-icons
description: selfh.st/icons is a collection of crisp, customizable SVG icons tailored for self-hosted dashboards. It provides consistent naming and theming, helping users visually organize services in tools like Homer, Dashy, or Heimdall.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Curated collection of SVG icons for popular self-hosted applications

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Unified visual style across all icons for cohesive dashboards

features.title: Dashboard Integration
features.description: Works seamlessly with Homer, Dashy, Heimdall, and other dashboard tools

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Easily recolor icons to match your theme using CSS or SVG properties

features.title: Dark Mode Variants
features.description: Includes optimized versions for both light and dark themes
